mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operatelog${Year} ( LOGID, ACCTID, OPTYPE, OPMENU, LOGCNTT, BEFORECNTT, AFTERCNTT, OPTIME ) VALUES ( #{logId}, #{acctId}, #{opType}, #{opMenu}, #{logCntt}, #{beforeCntt}, #{afterCntt}, #{opTime} );
mapper.select: select LOGID logId, ACCTID acctId, (CASE WHEN OPTYPE = '1' THEN '新增' WHEN OPTYPE = '2' THEN '修改' WHEN OPTYPE = '3' THEN '删除' END ) AS OPTYPE, (CASE WHEN OPMENU = 'CATEGORY_MANAGEMENT' THEN '品类管理' WHEN OPMENU = 'PRODUCT_MANAGEMENT' THEN '商品管理' WHEN OPMENU = 'USER_MANAGEMENT' THEN '用户管理' WHEN OPMENU = 'ROLE_MANAGEMENT' THEN '角色管理' END ) AS OPMENU, LOGCNTT logCntt, BEFORECNTT beforeCntt, AFTERCNTT afterCntt, OPTIME opTime from operatelog${Year} ORDER BY ADDTIME desc
